description: This file defines the LocalStorage class, providing an interface for storing and retrieving JSON objects, strings, and boolean values using the SharedPreferences package for persistent local storage in a Flutter application.

classes.name: LocalStorage
classes.description: A class that provides methods to persist and retrieve JSON data, strings, and booleans using SharedPreferences for local storage.

methods.name: setJson
methods.description: Encodes a Map as JSON and stores it with a specified key.

methods.name: getJson
methods.description: Retrieves a JSON-encoded string by key and decodes it into a Map.

methods.name: setString
methods.description: Stores a string value with a specified key.

methods.name: getString
methods.description: Retrieves a string value by key.

methods.name: setBool
methods.description: Stores a boolean value with a specified key.

methods.name: getBool
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean value by key, returning a default if not found.
